content:
Andreas: I'm going to have to throw-in with your friends and take a guess as to how many weeks or months it will take for you to be expecting delivery of your next 'baby'! ðŸ˜„

As for how much weight is too much to carry, all that I know is that that number seems to change with age, for sure. Past a certain point, as the age gets higher, the number gets lower. Believe that! Yet, even though I've crossed that threshold, I'm still clutching onto my DSLRs, heavy though they may be, especially if you get very good, fast lenses - the weight starts to pile on pretty quickly!
